name: Genesis/Nemesis
description:
You are about to go on your first date since the car accident.  The two AIs in your head are trying to help your date to be successful.  The mellow and ladylike Genesis encourages you to be yourself.  The rowdy tomboy Nemesis has already hacked your date's social media and is feeding you lines.  

Which AI do you work with?  Your angel or your devil? 

  • A dating sim made in three days
  • Cheat to impress your date or go legit
  • Have a chuckle or two at your AI friends

(Also I don't remember if I credited them in the game so just in case I will credit them here: big shout-out to Wayfarer Games for the inspiration!)
